# Parliament of the Kabardino-Balkarian Republic

|party1 = United Russia
|election1 = 18 September 2014
|members = 70
|structure1 = 6th Parliament of the Kabardino-Balkar Republic.svg
|structure1_res = 250px
|political_groups1 =
|border=darkgray}} United Russia (50)
|border=darkgray}} CPRF (9)

|border=darkgray}} LDPR (2)
|border=darkgray}} Greens (2)
|voting_system1 = Proportional

The Parliament of the Kabardino-Balkarian Republic () is the regional parliament of Kabardino-Balkaria, a federal subject of Russia. A total of 70 deputies are elected for five-year terms.
Elections
